title: Daniel Sturridge
summary: Daniel Andre Sturridge (/ˈstʌrɪdʒ/; born 1 September 1989) is an English professional footballer who plays as a striker for A-League club Perth Glory. As well as representing England, he has played in the Premier League for Manchester City, Chelsea, Bolton Wanderers, Liverpool and West Bromwich Albion, and he has also played for Turkish Süper Lig club Trabzonspor.
